entities.name: UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
entities.description: Country referenced in the securities law information and equity incentives for employees

entities.name: DUBAI
entities.description: City in the United Arab Emirates mentioned in connection with the Ministry of Economy and the Department of Economic Development

entities.name: EMIRATES SECURITIES AND COMMODITIES AUTHORITY
entities.description: Authority in the United Arab Emirates responsible for securities and commodities, mentioned as having no responsibility for reviewing or verifying documents in connection with the Plan

entities.name: MINISTRY OF ECONOMY
entities.description: Ministry in the United Arab Emirates mentioned in connection with the approval and verification of the Plan

entities.name: DUBAI DEPARTMENT OF ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
entities.description: Department in Dubai, United Arab Emirates mentioned in connection with the approval and verification of the Plan

entities.name: UNITED KINGDOM
entities.description: Country referenced in the terms and conditions for settlement of restricted stock units

entities.name: HER MAJESTY'S REVENUE AND CUSTOMS (HMRC)
entities.description: Tax authority in the United Kingdom mentioned in connection with the responsibility for taxes on restricted stock units

entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: Company referenced in the amended and restated 2007 equity incentive plan

relationships.relationship_description: Dubai is a city within the United Arab Emirates
The Emirates Securities and Commodities Authority operates within the United Arab Emirates
The Ministry of Economy is a governmental body within the United Arab Emirates
The Dubai Department of Economic Development operates within the city of Dubai
HMRC is the tax authority operating within the United Kingdom
